title: Most followed EPL team in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Manchester United and lowest at Response Bournemouth.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 32.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 20 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Manchester United and lowest at Response Bournemouth.
The highest Response Manchester United has 32.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Bournemouth.
Share of respondents at Response Manchester United is 32.0 , second place is Liverpool at 14.0, and thirdly is Manchester City at 9.0.

Response Aston Villa, Brighton & Hove Albion, Burnley, Everton, Leicester City, Norwich City, Sheffield United, Southampton, Watford, West Ham United, and Wolverhamption Wanderers have a similar Share of respondents that is 1.0.
The Response Bournemouth tends to be 7.62 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents is 84.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
